name: XCTestObserver
desc: An object that observes test activity and events.DeprecatedUse XCTestObservationCenter instead.

items.name: func testCaseDidFail(XCTestRun!, withDescription: String!, inFile: String!, atLine: Int)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test case fails.

items.name: func testCaseDidStart(XCTestRun!)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test case starts.

items.name: func testCaseDidStop(XCTestRun!)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test case stops.

items.name: func testSuiteDidStart(XCTestRun!)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test suite starts.

items.name: func testSuiteDidStop(XCTestRun!)
items.desc: Notifies the observer when a test suite stops.
